content: A-GFB Non-woven belt Ultimate non-woven belts for use with a band file for fine grinding and finishing of stainless steel, steel, aluminum and other metals ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Achieve satin finish, mirror finish or a defined surface roughness with our broad grade selection for fine grinding Non-woven belts engineered to reduce marks, smears and last longer Also available in coarse grain sizes for rougher grinding Developed for best results with Hilti variable-speed abrasive tools for professional metalwork Applications Fine grinding – finishing carbon and stainless steel to a smooth, uniform and attractive appearance Surface finishing – removing scratches from steel surfaces Mirror finishing – polishing stainless steel to a mirror finish ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Length: 18 in Width: 1/2 in Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Length | 21 in | Width | 1/2 in | Base material | Stainless steel, Steel ### ITEMS- 2243381 - Non-woven belt A-GFB 13x457 SPX coarse - Package Size 5 pc - 2243382 - Non-woven belt A-GFB 13x457 SPX medium - Package Size 5 pc
